meanings.definition: Relating to or located in the vallecula.
meanings.sent1: The vallecular taste buds help us enjoy different flavors.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the vallecular area for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The vallecular sensation of sweetness made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His vallecular observations were always insightful.
meanings.sent5: The vallecular colors of the sunset painted the sky beautifully.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the small depression between the base of the tongue and the epiglottis.
meanings.sent1: The vallecular space allows for smooth swallowing.
meanings.sent2: Speech therapists focus on improving vallecular function.
meanings.sent3: The vallecular gap seemed to play hide and seek with the food.
meanings.sent4: Her vallecular voice resonated with clarity and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The vallecular connection between taste and smell is fascinating.
